snippet: Former prime minister Alain Juppe said on Monday he would not run in France's presidential election and harshly criticized  his party's beleaguered candidate, Francois Fillon....

headline.main: Kremlin Says Seriously Worried About North Korea Missile Drills
headline.print_headline: Kremlin Says Seriously Worried About North Korea Missile Drills

lead_paragraph: Former prime minister Alain Juppe said on Monday he would not run in France's presidential election and harshly criticized  his party's beleaguered candidate, Francois Fillon.
